replies.body: huge props to boards volunteers for sifting through and checking 500+ summoner names! {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

500 ya reckon :)
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

Hey guys! Glad to see you all hyped for the RP distribution :D
Please be patient while we sift through the masses of entries we received. Due to this, it may take a while for the RP to show up in your account. We are aiming for this to happen by the end of next week at the lastest.

♥ the boards volunteers
I submitted with a group of five and they all recieved their rp but i didnt, has all rp been handed out?

Unfortunately your submission was ineligible because of an inappropriate summoner name. You won't get RP for this contest, but if you change your name you'll still be eligible for any future ones. Be aware that if you don't change your name you'll most likely be given a temp name and forced to.

My name is inappropriate because of your interpretation of what my name 'cnt' means, my name is sickcan'tmcgee.
 
I think that's entirely unfair and I'll be happy to change my name but I shouldn't be excluded because of someones incorrect interpretation of my name.

In game no one has ever shown any offence to it and it was not directed towards anyone.

Sorry man, but that being short for "can't" is shaky at best. Even if that is the case and it has some different meaning to you that it does to everyone else, with "sick ****" being a common phrasing, the fact is that such a meaning applies ONLY to you, and not to everyone else. 

You could for example say that KYS means "kick yourself" and not the other thing, but that doesn't change how everyone else sees it. If you wanted your name to be "SickCantMcgee you could have easily made it so, there was no need to shorten it.
I submitted too but didn't receive any RP, would it be because I might've typed Domo2 instead of DOMO2? thanks.
Summoner names aren't case sensitive, we have your submission but have to check something on it. I'll follow up with you in client once I know more since you added me ok?

Hello! 
My group submitted an S+, and the majority obtained the RP except me. 

I've seen that the reason for some was inappropriate usernames, 
but i pray that you DO NOT reply to me that my ign is inappropriate: RIP Koh Masaki  ( a tribute to deceased)
due to the implications of homophobia, which would be honestly disgusting. 

Otherwise really happy you guys did this and hope to get a response!
Looks like yours was a submission error, your name was submitted as rip koh misaki instead of your actual summoner name :) I'll put you on the list to get your RP.

Haven't played much of this game in recent times, logged in for a few cheeky urf games but we managed to gather up the lads to knock this mission down. Couple of wingmen setting our friends up for success on a saturday night is something we're decent at so we felt right at home as we shot for the top prize. We don't settle for anything less than the best and the boys really pulled through on this one so full credit to the boys, makes you wish you had this kind of team around for the school exams. But yeah nah got the S+ within a couple of goes at trying and we're looking forward to receiving our prize. Hoping for more events like these in the future to get the boys back online with goals to destroy. Cheers for the event and good luck to everyone else shooting for the stars, in this game mode or in life.

Hey, I submitted 3 entries for 3 different games, and so far as my mates and I can tell, something seems to have gone wrong with the third/last entry, as Ivern the Great (who was in the first entry team as well, which was the A+) has only gotten 400 RP for the A+ entry, but he was present in the 3rd entry, which was an S+ game. Everyone else from that 3rd entry has gotten their 1k, so maybe I fucked up in the submission and typed his name wrong, or it was written off as a double submission, idk, could you double check that please? I know you guys had a lot of entries to sift through too, so I can understand it easily being written off as a double submission because only one person in that third entry was different from the first.
It was indeed a mix up with multiple entries, my bad on that one :) I'll put his name on the list to get his RP fixed up.
I was just told by Mancer (I thought he did get it D: ) that he never got his RP either, and he was also in that third game, sorry for the bother, and thanks for your patience with all this.
Don't worry! He's on the corrections list as well :)
Great! Thanks for all the hard work.
Um so all 4 of my  teammates have received their reward for participating in the challenge but I still have not. Why is this?
You were one of the timestamp errors, you'll receive your RP with the rest of the corrections :)
Sorry for disturbing you but do you know when I will receive my RP? I have yet to receive it and I wish to purchase some skins from my shop which ends on the 4th of October.
Sorry we've had a few holdups, we are endeavouring to get RP delivered before the special shop closes :)

Hello a couple of my friends who I played onslaught with had received their RP a couple of days ago. Sorry for my paranoia but since my login name is different from in game name (Sir Kumsalot) I was wondering if there's any confusion with that.
Thankyou c:

Unfortunately your submission was ineligible because of an inappropriate summoner name. This means you won't be receiving RP for this contest, however should you change your name this won't affect eligibility in any future contests. Be aware that if you choose not to change your name however, that you may be given a temp name and forced to.

Oh dang it, people normally love my name :P
Thanks for the clarification

Is the RP going to be gifted soon? I submitted a screenshot for my friend but he still hasn't gotten his {{sticker:cass-cry}} 

Thanks for the contest anyway ^_^

It will take a while for the RP to be gifted, since there are so many entries to go through and check if they are legit and to get rid of any double ups. 

Be patient, you will get your RP eventually ❤

Let's say I play with two different clubs, or the same club but a different team, and both get different scores (one A+, one S+, as an example). If both of those games are submitted,  would I get credited with the higher score? The whole idea here is I want the others in the lower score game to actually get a reward, while I want the higher tier reward for the second game.

In other words, can two different games be submitted in which I or perhaps others too are present so the people in the lower score game who aren't in the higher score game don't miss out on getting a reward at all, while I or anyone else present in the lower score game who also participated in the higher score game get the higher tier reward?

I hope this makes sense.
You'll receive rewards based on your highest submitted (and eligible) score :)

Okay great! I played with three different groups and had this situation and I really didn't want my mates from the lower score group or in different groups to miss out, so that's good to know.

I submitted all of those games myself (hopefully I didn't fuck it up lmao) and I think OKAY OKAY also submitted one S+ game, sorry about the dupes.

EDIT: I've just realised that the post game lobby doesn't actually show that the games were onslaught games, do you want screenies of the matches from my match history where it shows the difficulty level too?
You don't get ranks in normal mode, so we know they are onslaught :)
what if i used a discord link like https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/271104316071215108/357058956746555392/2017-09-12_16-59-58.png, does it count? if not ill resubmit
Discord links are a-ok since they work the same as imgur and the like :) As long as we can see them without any fuss there's no problem what platform you use.

Spend a day trying to get an S, best is A+

Make one attempt tonight to get an S, end up with an S+

Turns out the boss battle is pretty much the determining factor, which we kept failing hard at. Do well there and you can get at least an S-
Got that sweet S+ eventually though :)
When do we get a RP??{{champion:103}}
Once the contest concludes (Wednesday(13/09) 5PM AEST) and we have checked through all the eligibility rewards will be distributed.

So if you guys are capable of doing something like this to make the forums look different why don't the different boards have their own unique designs? Look at the NA boards, they have a different background every time a new event occurs.

I don't know the detailed logistics since I'm not the one that does them, but I know that these pages are something the volunteers (primarily Wuks, Seph and Elam) do in their own time. We don't really have the resources to do it for everything, though certainly it's something we'd like to do if it becomes possible.

Hey there, just finished up about 6 hours grinding with the boys. There was pleasant times and not so pleasant times. Was super fun though. game mode was interesting and frustrating both at the same time. How do we know when we get rp? we all have the same tag and got S+.
If you are eligible then you will receive the reward once we have everything finalised and checked, sometime after Wednesday.
Does it have to be just the new SG or can it be a mix of new and old SGs?
Any! As long as you meet the entry criteria (Onslaught mode, premade 5, same club tags) you can play however you wish from there.
If each person from a team submitted a form is that still okay? As in, the team I did it in, we each submitted our own form to it rather than just one of us.
We'll filter out the duplicates, don't worry about it :) Ideally it's one submission per team, but I'm sure we'll manage :)
does only one person have to send in the screenshot or everyone in the game?
Just one person per team to submit the screenshot is enough ♥
do you have to be in the same club? me and my friends completed it and got s+ however we didnt use the same club :(

As per the FAQ above all players must have the same club tag equipped during the game that you get the ranking. Gotta show off that fancy team synergy, best of luck though, you did it once I am sure you can do it again :D

Hope this helps!

~Elam

OMG, This background is amazing!!!. 

It's so pretty !! 

I'm also super excited to keep trying out this game mode even though I've lost my sanity playing it (played 8 hours last night and lost all the onslaught games :( ....) {{item:3070}} 

I don't think I'll ever look at a Velcoz, KogMaw, Reksai, and Khaziks the same way ever again.

Wish me luck!!
